CustomField.description: This is used to identify the records which was created when agreement's 'On Hold' is checked/unchecked. That is, if Flag is set, the the record details gives when agreement was on hold.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used to identify the records which was created when agreement's 'On Hold' is checked/unchecked. That is, if Flag is set, the the record details gives when agreement was on hold.
CustomField.label: Flag
